name: pnp-add-multiple-tasks
title: Add multiple tasks in Planner
shortDescription: This script will create multiple tasks to a Planner plan from the information provided in your `csv` file.
longDescription: This script will create multiple tasks to a Planner plan from the information provided in your `csv` file. For this particular example, the `csv` file should contain the following columns: `TaskName`, `Description`, `PlanID`, `BucketName`, `StartDateTime`, `AssignedToUserNames`.

references.name: Want to learn more about CLI for Microsoft 365 and the commands
references.description: Check out the CLI for Microsoft 365 site to get started and for the reference to the commands.
